SELECT id , gacha_id , user_id , type , status , title , content , file_id , hope_method , hope_location , hope_address , hope_location_latitude , hope_location_longitude , created_at , updated_at FROM TRADE WHERE id = #{tradeId}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , '' AS user_nickname , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , T.hope_method , T.hope_location , T.hope_address , T.hope_location_latitude , T.hope_location_longitude , ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status != 'DELETED' AND status != 'CANCELED_BEFORE_RESPONSE' ) AS suggest_count , T.created_at FROM TRADE T WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type} AND status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
